How to Match & Switch Frequencies: First, power on your car radio, tune it to a blank FM frequency. (A blank frequency is a channel with no active radio programs broadcasting on it, producing only a slight rustling or static noise through car's speaker). Set the transmitter to the same frequency as the car radio. Switch frequency: Long press the rotate button of Nulaxy transmitter until the frequency starts flashing, rotate the button clockwise to increase frequency. Otherwise, decrease frequency.
